pluggable.name: Breezy Archives
pluggable.author: Joel Lee
pluggable.description: An archives plugin which mimics ‘Live Archives’ on WordPress. When JavaScript is not available, it will graceful degrade to a ‘Clean Archives’.

help.value:
To use, add <?php $theme->breezyarchives(); ?> to your theme where you want the archives output.

A template file is included for customizing your theme.
